name: Roachling Scout
senses: darkvision 60 ft., tremorsense 10 ft., passive Perception 16

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The roachling scout makes two begrimed shortsword attacks or two begrimed dart attacks.

actions.name: Begrimed Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Begrimed Dart
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.desc: The roachling scout has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

special_abilities.name: Resistant
special_abilities.desc: The roachling scout has advantage on Constitution saving throws.

special_abilities.name: Stealthy Traveler
special_abilities.desc: The roachling scout can move stealthily while traveling at a normal pace.

special_abilities.name: Unlovely
special_abilities.desc: The roachling scout has disadvantage on Charisma (Performance) and Charisma (Persuasion) checks in interactions with non-roachlings.
